title: nf-amr pipeline - params.readsets schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.readsets

readset_id.errorMessage: Identifier for the readset, must be provided and cannot contain spaces

sample_id.errorMessage: Identifier for the sample the readset belong to, by default equal to readset_id

long_reads.errorMessage: Wrong path provided (cannot contain spaces and must end with .bam, .fastq.gz or .fq.gz)

short_reads_1.errorMessage: Wrong path provided (cannot contain spaces and must end with .fastq.gz or .fq.gz)

short_reads_2.errorMessage: Wrong path provided (cannot contain spaces and must end with .fastq.gz or .fq.gz)
